# beget_configuration_groups (Data Source)

List all available CPU family groups (e.g., high_cpu, normal_cpu) as a map keyed by group identifier.

## Map Structure
- Key: group identifier (e.g., `high_cpu`, `normal_cpu`)
- Value fields: `group`, `name`

## Example Usage
```terraform
# Fetch all CPU family groups
data "beget_configuration_groups" "all" {}

output "group_ids" {
  value = keys(data.beget_configuration_groups.all.groups)
}
```
```terraform
# Access specific group from the map
data "beget_configuration_groups" "all" {}

locals {
  high_cpu = data.beget_configuration_groups.all.groups["high_cpu"]
}

output "high_cpu_group" {
  value = {
    group = local.high_cpu.group
    name  = local.high_cpu.name
  }
}
```

### Read-Only

- `groups` (Attributes Map) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups))

<a id="nestedatt--groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `groups`

Read-Only:

- `group` (String)
- `name` (String)
